page.title: 12Recreation 2
page.content: {Indoor Activities}Storth provides the main venue here, with various clubs and societies. {Adult Groups}The village has a WI branch, a Mothers Union, a Wednesday Club (Young Wives), Operatic Society ('The Entertainers') and, in association with the WEA, a Folk Dancing Group and Upholstery Class. Coffee mornings and rummage sales abound. The two small hotels - the Ship and the Derby Arms - provide darts and bar billiards together with a variety of special events evenings. {Youth Groups}The younger children may join the Cubs or Brownies, but apart from Guides and the area Young Farmers Club, teenagers and young adults are very poorly catered for.
